title: Comparing Budgets: SF and LA
question_text:
Kim has received two job offers, one in San Francisco and the other in Los Angeles. She has been comparing the cost of living in both cities and has come up with budgets for both cities. These budgets (as percents of her salary per year) are displayed in the pie charts below.


If both jobs pay $\$50{,}000$ annually, how much more would Kim pay for housing and utilities in San Francisco than in Los Angeles?
